archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0143
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner, I want to give customers the option of verifying their identity within self service, so that if we need to help them in the future, we know who they are

properties.value: What kind of identity check do you have right now and what kind of information do you expect to be verified? Similar to REQ_BSS_0138, but here not part of a buy journey, but a voluntary Details to be defined.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
